name: Extra Cantrips or Orisons

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Ability to cast cantrips or orisons.

sections.body: Add two cantrips to your cantrips known or two orisons to your orisons known.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, add two cantrips or orisons to your spells known.
sections.name: Special

description: You are a master of minor spells.
